com.sri.kernel.srml
Class SRMLParser

java.lang.Object
  com.sri.kernel.srml.SRMLParser
public class SRMLParser
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class which parses SRML documents. It uses the XML Pull library, found here, implemented by a KXmlParser, found here.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots

Field Summary
protected  org.kxml2.io.KXmlParser parser
          The underlying KXml Parser being used

Constructor Detail

SRMLParser

public SRMLParser(java.util.Hashtable elements,
                  Logger logger,
                  java.lang.String s)
           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new parser with the given elements, logger, and SRML.

Parameters:
elements - The list of SRML Elements to use.
logger - The logger used to log information.

SRMLParser

public SRMLParser(java.util.Hashtable elements,
                  Logger logger,
                  java.io.InputStreamReader is)
           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new parser with the given elements, and logger, using the InputStream [is] for reading the SRML. This can be used for parsing SRML from a file, rather than from a string.

Parameters:
elements - The list of SRML Elements to use.
logger - The logger used to log information.
is - The input stream from which to read SRML.
Method Detail

parse

public java.lang.String parse()
                       throws SRMLParsingException
Performs the parsing process on the provided SRML.

Returns:
The returned string of the SRML.
Throws:
SRMLParsingException
